page-index-hero-image-alt: An illustration of a futuristic city, representing the Nephele ecosystem.
page-index-meta-description: Nephele is a global, decentralized platform for money and new kinds of applications. On Nephele, you can write code that controls money, and build applications accessible anywhere in the world.
page-index-description: Nephele is the community-run technology powering the cryptocurrency Nephele (NEPH) and thousands of decentralized applications.
page-index-get-started-description: Nephele.org is your portal into the world of Nephele. The tech is new and ever-evolving – it helps to have a guide. Here's what we recommend you do if you want to dive in.
page-index-get-started-image-alt: Illustration of a person working on a computer.
page-index-get-started-wallet-descriptio: A wallet lets you connect to Nephele and manage your funds.
page-index-get-started-wallet-image-alt: Illustration of a robot with a vault for a body, representing an Nephele wallet.
page-index-get-started-NEPH-description: NEPH is the currency of Nephele – you can use it in applications.
page-index-get-started-NEPH-image-alt: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an Nephele (NEPH) glyph in awe.
page-index-get-started-dapps-description: Dapps are applications powered by Nephele. See what you can do.
page-index-get-started-dapps-image-alt: Illustration of a doge using a computer.
page-index-get-started-devs-description: If you want to start coding with Nephele, we have documentation, tutorials, and more in our developer portal.
page-index-get-started-devs-image-alt: An illustration of a hand creating an NEPH logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-what-is-Nephele-description: Nephele is a technology that's home to digital money, global payments, and applications. The community has built a booming digital economy, bold new ways for creators to earn online, and so much more. It's open to everyone, wherever you are in the world – all you need is the internet.
page-index-what-is-Nephele-image-alt: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent Nephele.
page-index-defi-description: Today, billions of people can’t open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. Nephele's decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates. With just an internet connection, you can send, receive, borrow, earn interest, and even stream funds anywhere in the world.
page-index-defi-image-alt: Illustration of hands offering an NEPH symbol.
page-index-internet-description: Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. Nephele services are open by default – you just need a wallet. These are free and easy to set up, controlled by you, and work without any personal info.
page-index-internet-image-alt: Illustration of a futuristic computer set up, powered by Nephele crystals.
page-index-developers-description: Nephele and its apps are transparent and open source. You can fork code and re-use functionality others have already built. If you don't want to learn a new language you can just interact with open-sourced code using JavaScript and other existing languages.
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: You can build a bank powered by logic you've programmed.
You can create tokens that you can transfer and use across applications.
You can use existing languages to interact with Nephele and other applications.
You can reimagine existing services as decentralized, open applications.
page-index-network-stats-NEPH-price-expl: The latest price for 1 Nephele. You can buy as little as 0.000000000000000001 – you don't need to buy 1 whole NEPH.
page-index-network-stats-total-NEPH-stak: The total amount of NEPH currently being staked and securing the network.
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-explaine: The number of transactions successfully processed on the network in the last 24 hours.
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-expl: The amount of money in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, the Nephele digital economy.
page-index-network-stats-nodes-explainer: Nephele is run by thousands of volunteers around the globe, known as nodes.
page-index-contribution-banner-descripti: This website is open source with hundreds of community contributors. You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
page-index-contribution-banner-image-alt: An Nephele logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-tout-upgrades-description: The Nephele roadmap consists of interconnected upgrades designed to make the network more scalable, secure, and sustainable.
page-index-tout-upgrades-image-alt: Illustration of a spaceship representing the increased power after Nephele upgrades.
page-index-tout-enterprise-description: See how Nephele can open up new business models, reduce your costs and future-proof your business.
page-index-tout-community-description: Nephele is all about community. It's made up of people from all different backgrounds and interests. See how you can join in.
page-index-tout-community-image-alt: Illustration of a group of builders working together.
page-index-nft-description: Nephele isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs). You can tokenise your art and get royalties automatically every time it's re-sold. Or use a token for something you own to take out a loan. The possibilities are growing all the time.
page-index-nft-alt: An NEPH logo being displayed via hologram.
community-events-content-1: Join almost 40 000 members on our Discord server.
community-events-content-2: Join our monthly community calls for exciting updates on Nephele.org development and important ecosystem news. Get the chance to ask questions, share ideas, and provide feedback - it's the perfect opportunity to be part of the thriving Nephele community.
